Doctor milne se kya hota hai. Where are the resources, infrastructure, management, beds, medicines, staff. And direct specialist dr milke bhi kya hoga. It should be the GP who should decide whether we need a specialist really. A GP ( mbbs) can manage 75% of the cases. Because of this specialist ka bolbala we hardly find a good GP nowadays nearby in our societies.
So basically isme government ka issue nahi isme logo ka issue he khas kar ye private ya sarkari doctors ka ye log health ko business samajte he
Our health system is far better than USA‚Ä¶ i lived in USA and came back to India just for better health care .. trust ne
Youtuber ko sun sun kar aur unhealthy hote ja re h.

Sbse badi baat bhai tum bi unhealthy hi ho aur dikh bi rhe ho
Indian khana bhut acha hai, gaon k logo ko jakar dekh lo jo shirf Indian khana khate hai, aaj k log fast food khate hai bhut or yha k log physical activity kam karte oh problem hai bs
India me koi obese nahi h bas jo skinny h vo kamjor h üòÇ

Bhai jo sabko pata hai wahi bata rahe ho. Koi solution ya proper diet in low budget batate to log follow karte. Solution kuchh nahi bas problems bata rahe ho jo sabko pata hai. India me poori diet ki wajah finance hai. Low budget me kuchh achhi diet batao to logo ka bhala hoga
Main problem hai stress or depression iski wajah se bhi kai bimariya jo ho nahi sakti woh bhi ho rahi hai
